repository.name: ProtectMyTooling
repository.description: Multi-Packer wrapper letting us daisy-chain various packers, obfuscators and other Red Team oriented weaponry. Featured with artifacts watermarking, IOCs collection & PE Backdooring. You feed it with your implant, it does a lot of sneaky things and spits out obfuscated executable.

development_potential.assessment: Excellent potential for integration. High community engagement with 991 stars and active development. Consider for immediate evaluation.
